name: BugDive Deluxe Demo Edition
description:
BugDive Deluxe is a game/interactive comic all about finding bugs. The game started development in Summer 2021 and will hopefully release late 2022!

More info: My Website

DEMO FEATURES

  • 8 bugs, 40 stages
  • Funny Comic Cat
  • Some other funny things (:

FEATURES FOR THE FULL GAME THAT ISN'T FINISHED YET HAHA

  • 100 unique bugs across 500 story mode stages.
  • Story mode featuring fully voiced interactive comics.
  • Plenty of bonus games and secrets.
  • Scene creator mode.
